name: Helinox Savanna Chair
description: Lounging comfort is no longer reserved for car campers. The large backrest and winged armrests let you fully relax, A bottle attachment keeps your favourite refreshment close at hand. The Savanna Chair uses technology from high-end tents, so it's light enough to carry down to the dock or the lakeshore for panoramic sunset and star viewing.Made with light, strong DAC aluminum, 600-denier polyester, and breathable mesh.Backrest extends up high to rest your head.Seat height from ground is 45cm.Load capacity is 145kg.Assembled dimensions are 79 x 70 x 112cm.Storage sack converts to a pillow (just stuff with your jacket).
